name: Bambi Racing
description:
THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY ON A DEMO PHASE. MOST THINGS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE AS THE GAME IS STILL ON DEVELOPMENT!

TECH DEMO 1 IS OUT! THANK YOU FOR WAITING THIS LONG.

Based on a character of a popular Friday Night Funkin' Mod, this racing game aims to be a fun racing experience, starring Bambi!

The full game will include:

  • Story Mode
  • More playable characters
  • More cups and tracks
  • More game modes
  • Improvements

I hope you can enjoy the game as much as I did developing it. More updates will be coming soon, so stay tuned!

If you see any bug, please report it on the comments section.
